title: Hearts sign Danny Amankwaa from FC Copenhagen
description: Hearts have signed Danish winger Danny Amankwaa on an 18-month contract from FC Copenhagen.
content: The 23-year-old joins the club, subject to international clearance, after 67 appearances for FC Copenhagen since 2012.Amankwaa, who has been capped by his country at youth level, has won three Danish Cups with his previous club and has Championship and Europa League experience."I'm very happy to be here and I can't wait to play in front of these amazing fans that I've heard so much about," he told Hearts' official website.This window, Hearts have loaned Steven Naismith from Norwich for the rest of the season and completed a loan deal for Manchester United's Demetri Mitchell.Craig Levein's side are also in talks to sell Esmael Goncalves to Pakhtakor Tashkent, though no deal has been agreed.
